title: Which item is better to get 1st Deathcap or Luden's Echo

replies.body:
Never get deathcap first unless you're veigar, cassiopeia or a champ that naturally gains AP

Luden's echo is a viable choice for champs that have no waveclear. If you don't have any specific need for items. Sadly, most champions need another item as core.

Or you could not do either, both scale better as a item past the first.

Basically every other NLR item is better built first (Luden's can still be built first on champions that use the proc well, but the champs that do that now with it being 10 per spell is so few and far between)
id go with neither, ever. otherwise in terms of damage since ludens got nerfed maybe the cap but otherwise ludens is still cheaper and offers ms for utility which is preferable in early game
